Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-01: Do you physically and logically separate Institution's data from that of other customers?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-02: Will Institution's data be stored on any devices (database servers, file servers, SAN, NAS, …) configured with non-RFC 1918/4193 (i.e. publicly routable) IP addresses?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-03: Is sensitive data encrypted in transport? (e.g. system-to-client)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-04: Is sensitive data encrypted in storage (e.g. disk encryption, at-rest)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-05: Do you employ or allow any cryptographic modules that do not conform to the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS PUB 140-2)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-06: Does your system employ encryption technologies when transmitting sensitive information over TCP/IP networks (e.g., SSH, SSL/TLS, VPN)? (e.g. system-to-system and system-to-client)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-07: List all locations (i.e. city + datacenter name) where the institution's data will be stored?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-08: At the completion of this contract, will data be returned to the institution?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-09: Will the institution's data be available within the system for a period of time at the completion of this contract?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-10: Can the institution extract a full backup of data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-11: Are ownership rights to all data, inputs, outputs, and metadata retained by the institution?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-12: Are these rights retained even through a provider acquisition or bankruptcy event?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-13: In the event of imminent bankruptcy, closing of business, or retirement of service, will you provide 90 days for customers to get their data out of the system and migrate applications?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-14: Describe or provide a reference to the backup processes for the servers on which the service and/or data resides.

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-15: Are backup copies made according to pre-defined schedules and securely stored and protected?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-16: How long are data backups stored?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-17: Are data backups encrypted?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-18: Do you have a cryptographic key management process (generation, exchange, storage, safeguards, use, vetting, and replacement), that is documented and currently implemented, for all system components? (e.g. database, system, web, etc.)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-19: Do current backups include all operating system software, utilities, security software, application software, and data files necessary for recovery?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-20: Are you performing off site backups? (i.e. digitally moved off site)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-21: Are physical backups taken off site? (i.e. physically moved off site)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-22: Do backups containing the institution's data ever leave the Institution's Data Zone either physically or via network routing?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-23: Do you have a media handling process, that is documented and currently implemented, including end-of-life, repurposing, and data sanitization procedures?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-24: Does the process described in DATA-23 adhere to DoD 5220.22-M and/or NIST SP 800-88 standards?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-25: Do procedures exist to ensure that retention and destruction of data meets established business and regulatory requirements?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-26: Is media used for long-term retention of business data and archival purposes stored in a secure, environmentally protected area?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-27: Will you handle data in a FERPA compliant manner?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Data (v2.11)
Question: DATA-28: Is any institution data visible in system administration modules/tools?
